Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is tailored to meet your needs and expectations. This exceptional item has been meticulously designed with quality and functionality in mind, ensuring it exceeds your requirements. I believe its value goes beyond $120, reflecting its superior craftsmanship and unique features. To make this opportunity accessible to you, I am offering it at an introductory price of $150. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to consider this investment in enhancing your experience. If you have any questions or need further information, please let me know. I look forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
